{H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may discard target Permanent.
{R} Roll a die. On a 4+: Target Character gains 1 boost.
When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — If you control one or more Landmarks: [Sabotage].
{H} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Roll a die. On a 4+, draw a card. On a 1-3, [Resupply].
At Dusk — You may pay {1}. If you do: You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.
{H} If you control one or more Landmarks: I gain 2 boosts.
When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — If I have 1 or more boosts: Draw a card.
At Dusk — Roll a die. On a 4+: Draw a card.
{H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Roll a die. On a 4+, I gain [[Anchored]]. On a 1-3, I gain 3 boosts.
{H} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Each Character controlled by target player gains [[Fleeting]].
When I leave the Expedition zone — If you control one or more Landmarks: Draw a card.
